details.access_and_opening_times:
Opening hours

Monday to Friday, 9am to 5pm

Visa Section

From 31 March, 2014 the new UK Visas and Immigration commercial partner, Teleperformance Ltd, has taken over the running of the Visa Application Centre in Yerevan. The location of the Visa Application Centre has moved to the Marriott Hotel. The opening hours and times are Mondays and Tuesdays 9am to 2pm. As before, all bookings and payments must be made online. Please see http://www.tpcontact.co.uk for full details.

2015 public holidays

  • Thursday 01 January New Year’s Day
  • Tuesday 6 January Christmas Day
  • Monday 9 March International Women’s Day
  • Friday 3 April Good Friday
  • Monday 6 April Easter Monday
  • Friday 24 April Genocide Memorial Day
  • Friday 22 May Queen’s Birthday Privilege Day
  • Monday 25 May Spring Bank Holiday
  • Monday 6 July Constitution Day
  • Monday 21 September Independence Day
  • Thursday 24 December Christmas Privilege Holiday
  • Friday 25 December Christmas Day
  • Monday 28 December In lieu of Saturday 26 December Boxing Day
  • Thursday 31 December New Year’s Eve
